Feats: Keen Mind; Mobile; Mounted Combatant; Observant; Resilient Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment Monk Features: Arms Of The Astral Self; Awakened Astral Self; Body Of The Astral Self; Dedicated Weapon; Deflect Missiles; Diamond Soul; Empty Body; Evasion; Extra Attack; Flurry Of Blows; Flurry Of Healing And Harm; Focused Aim; Hand Of Harm; Hand Of Healing; Hand Of Ultimate Mercy; Implements Of Mercy; Improved Unarmored Movement; Ki-Empowered Strikes; Ki-Fueled Attack; Ki; Martial Arts; Monk Bonus Attack; Monk Timeless Body; Monk Unarmored Defense; Patient Defense; Perfect Self; Physician's Touch; Purity Of Body; Quickened Healing; Save Proficiency (Dexterity/Strength); Skill Proficiency (Choose 2 from Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, Stealth); Slow Fall; Step Of The Wind; Stillness Of Mind; Stunning Strike; Tongue Of The Sun And Moon; Tool Proficiency (Choose 1 from any Artisan, any Music); Unarmored Movement; Visage Of The Astral Self; Way Of Mercy; Way Of The Astral Self; Weapon Proficiency (Simple/Shortsword) Acolyte Features: Languages (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight/Religion)
Feature Notes:
Implements Of Mercy: Own identifying mask
Keen Mind: Always know direction of north and hours until sunrise or sunset; recall anything seen or heard during the past month
Ki: Use 20 Ki Points/short rest
Monk Timeless Body: No debility from aging, need no food or water
Observant: Read lips
Shelter Of The Faithful: Receive aid from associated temple
Tongue Of The Sun And Moon: Communicate in any language
Visage Of The Astral Self: Spend 1 Ki Point to gain 120' Darkvision and R600' voice or R60' directed voice for 10 min
Skill Proficiency: Athletics; History; Insight; Medicine; Religion

Skill Notes:
Implements Of Mercy: Skill Proficiency (Insight/Medicine)/Tool Proficiency (Herbalism Kit)
Observant: +5 passive Investigation and Perception
Visage Of The Astral Self: Spend 1 Ki Point to gain Adv on Insight and Intimidation for 10 min
Combat
Hit Points: 121 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 15 Attacks Per Round: 2
Weapon Proficiency: Shortsword; Simple
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Club: 1 (+8 1d4+2); Greatclub: 1 (+8 1d8+2); Unarmed: 1 (+8 1d10+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Martial Arts: When unarmored, gain +2 attack and damage with monk weapons, raise damage die to 1d10, and gain Monk Bonus Attack
Monk Unarmored Defense: +3 AC in no armor
Arms Of The Astral Self: Spend 1 Ki for R10' targets suffer 2d10 HP force (DC 17 Dex neg); self gains +5' unarmed reach, unarmed +1 attack and +1 HP force damage for 10 min
Awakened Astral Self: Spend 5 Ki Points to summon Arms, Visage, and Body Of The Astral Self and gain +2 AC and 1 extra Arms attack/rd
Body Of The Astral Self: Summon both Arms and Visage Of The Astral Self to use Reaction to negate 1d10+3 HP acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage and inflict +1d10 HP damage on 1 Arms hit/rd
Dedicated Weapon: Designate non-heavy weapon as monk weapon 1/short rest
Deflect Missiles: Use Reaction to reduce missile damage by 1d10+22
Flurry Of Blows: Spend 1 Ki Point for 2 additional unarmed strikes
Flurry Of Healing And Harm: Substitute Hand Of Healing for multiple strikes in Flurry Of Blows, use Hand Of Harm once during Flurry Of Blows w/out spending Ki Point
Focused Aim: Spend 1 - 3 Ki Points for +2/Ki Point on missed attack roll
Hand Of Harm: Spend 1 Ki Point to inflict +1d10+3 HP necrotic w/unarmed strike 1/rd
Hand Of Healing: Spend 1 Ki Point or forego 1 Flurry Of Blows strike to heal 1d10+3 HP
Ki-Empowered Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magical
Ki-Fueled Attack: Spend 1 Ki Point for bonus monk weapon attack
Mobile: Dash at full speed in difficult terrain, no OA from targeted foe
Monk Bonus Attack: Bonus unarmed strike after monk weapon attack
Mounted Combatant: Adv on melee attacks on unmounted foe smaller than mount, redirect attack on mount to self, mount takes no damage on Dex save, half on fail
Patient Defense: Spend 1 Ki Point for bonus Dodge
Perfect Self: Minimum 4 Ki Points after initiative
Physician's Touch: Hand Of Heal ends disease or condition; Hand Of Harm poisons for 1 rd
Quickened Healing: Spend 2 Ki Points to heal 1d10+6 HP
Step Of The Wind: Spend 1 Ki Point for bonus Disengage or Dash and dbl jump
Stunning Strike: Spend 1 Ki Point to stun foe after hit (DC 17 Con neg) for 1 rd
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Constitution; Dexterity; Intelligence; Strength; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 6; Constitution: 8; Dexterity: 8; Intelligence: 9; Strength: 6; Wisdom: 9
Save Notes:
Diamond Soul: Proficient all saves, spend 1 Ki Point to re-roll
Resilient: Save Proficiency (Choose 1 from any)
Evasion: Dex save yields no damage instead of half
Purity Of Body: Immune to disease and poison
Stillness Of Mind: End self charm and fright at will
Magic
Magic Notes:
Empty Body: Spend 4 Ki Points for 1 min invisibility w/resistance to all damage but force, 8 Ki Points for Astral Projection
Hand Of Ultimate Mercy: Spend 5 Ki Points to revive corpse dead up to 1 dy 1/long rest; restores 4d10+3 HP and removes conditions
Notes
* Ability Boosts: +1 Charisma; +1 Intelligence
